Madison.Halle Steensland House:
The Halle Steensland House (also known as the Bethel Parish Shoppe) is a historic house located at 315 North Carroll Street in Madison, Wisconsin. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places on November 30, 1982.It is locally significant as one of the finest brick Queen Anne houses in Madison.


== Description and history ==
The Queen Anne style house is a three-story structure constructed of wood frame with red brick veneer and stone trim, in a very eclectic adaptation of the style.
